Â« Gecko Roles Page

Description

A toggle button. A specialized push button that can be checked or unchecked, but does not provide a separate indicator for the current state.

Mapped to

  • AT-SPI: ROLE_TOGGLE_BUTTON
  • ATK: ATK_ROLE_TOGGLE_BUTTON
  • UA: NSAccessibilityButtonRole
  • MSAA: ROLE_SYSTEM_PUSHBUTTON
  • IA2: IA2_ROLE_TOGGLE_BUTTON

Used by

Not used.
title: ROLE TOGGLE BUTTON
